A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Mark Hamill is amazing as Luke Skywalker\, and the story involving him\, Kylo Ren\, and Rey is the best part of the movie...but it's only PART of a 2.5 hour dumpster fire full of plot holes\, merchandising\, and moments so rediculous it makes Fonzie jumping a shark seem totally reasonable (Im talking about you Princess Leia). Besides the Jedi part of the story\, you're basically watching a slow speed car chase (a la OJ Simpson) through outer space.
